name: Cat Simulator: Game for Cats
description:
Your cat will be impressed with the Cat Simulator game! Interact with your kitty in an absolutely new way. Bring new experience and a lot of fun to the relationship with your beloved pet by playing the Cat Simulator game. Get even closer with your cat by talking to him or her, playing meow sounds and training with the ultrasonic whistle.

 Cat Simulator Game Content & Main Features:
– 50+ Cat Meow Sounds Library – click on meow sounds to play them and wait for your pet's reaction to understand which sounds he likes and which are better not to play;
– Human to Cat Talk Translator Simulator – allows you to talk to your cat, breaking the language barrier; 
– Ultrasonic Whistle – allows you to train your cat to follow your commands;
– No ads!

Disclaimer: This game is created for cat lovers and is not a real cat translator. It is made for entertainment purposes only.
Attention: If your cat reacts badly to this game or it causes unpleasant cat reactions, please stop using it so as not to harm your pet.

Note that free version of the game is limited to:
– 9 Cat Meow Sounds;
– 1 Talk Simulator;
– 1 Whistle.
If you want to use the game without limits an auto-renewable subscription ”Cat Simulator Premium” is available.

 Auto-renewable Subscription ”Cat Simulator Premium” Info:
By subscribing you get premium (full, unlimited) access to all the features and content offered by Cat Simulator game.

Auto-renewable Subscription “Cat Simulator Premium” Includes:
– Unlock All Meow Sounds;
– Unlimited Talk Simulator;
– Unlimited Whistles;

The game contains the following auto-renewable subscription called ”Cat Simulator Premium”:
– Weekly (0,99 US$) with a 3-days for free period.
* Subscription price may vary depending on your location;
* Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase;
* Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period;
* Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal;
* Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account;
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/cat-simulator-privacy/
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/cat-simulator-terms/

Requested Access:
Microphone – access to record your speech and translate it into cat language.
